lead_paragraph: Ignacio Piatti scored twice as the Montreal Impact beat the Vancouver Whitecaps 3-2 in the MLS season opener for both clubs on Sunday.

headline.print_headline: Piatti Score Twice, Impact Beat Whitecaps 3-2 in Opener
headline.main: Piatti Score Twice, Impact Beat Whitecaps 3-2 in Opener
